'''''J.R.R. Tolkien: Master of Fantasy''''', written by David R. Collins with illustrations by William Heagy, is a biographical book about J.R.R. Tolkien.

* ''[https://archive.org/details/jrrtolkienmaster00coll/page/n7/mode/2up J.R.R. Tolkien: Master of Fantasy]'' at the [[wikipedia:Internet Archive|Internet Archive]] (available to borrow for free)
